review: We took this with us on a vacation to Chicago and we watched shows as a family in our hotel.  This was worth every penny.  Use it at home too.  Easy to use and set up.  Just be careful about accidentally ordering a movie.

review: Love it!! Easy to install and easy to use. Now if my husband would stop losing the remote it would be awesome!!

review: Great so far! love that it will start a new episode without me having 2 tell it 2.. do wish the golden girls was included in the prime. Love that show
author: Amanda

review: Bought this to replace an Apple TV I had borrowed. I wanted to be able to watch Hulu, Netflix, and Amazon Prime (no Amazon on Apple TV). It works ok. Sometimes it has a weird skipping quirk. It also loses the connection regularly  (we are in a 900 sq ft apartment) which could be the Internet provider but we didn't have nearly as much of a problem with the Apple TV.  Ultimately it is ok since this is just for the TV in our bedroom. However, if it was for our main TV I would probably try Amazon Fire TV.
author: Crystal

review: I am really enjoying it. A must if you are an amazon prime member.
